notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!

taskDescription: Fatty acids are synthesized by a multistep route that starts with acetate. The first step is a reaction between protein-bound acetyl and malonyl units to give a protein-bound 3-ketobutyryl unit. Show the mechanism, and tell what kind of reaction is occurring.
